@graph.name: Lech Borowiec
@graph.description: Lech Borowiec currently works at the Department of Biodiversity and Evolutionary Taxonomy, University of Wroclaw. Lech does research in Zoology and Systematics (Taxonomy) of chrysomelid beetles and ants. Their current projects are: (1) Monograph of Afrotropical Cassidinae part VII - the genus Cassida; (2) Ants (Formicidae) of Greece and Aegean Region - various taxonomic and faunistic studies on ants of Balkans and eastern part of the Mediterranean Basin; (3) Revision of Australopapuan Notosacantha (Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae)
